text: Valeri Akimovich Zverkov (; born 15 February 1970) is a former Russian football player. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:Living people Category:Soviet footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Association football forwards Category:FC Energiya Volzhsky players Category:FC Tekstilshchik Kamyshin players Category:FC Mordovia Saransk players Category:FC SKA Rostov-on-Don players Category:Russian footballers Category:Russian Premier League players Category:FC Dynamo Stavropol players
title: Valeri Zverkov
